oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard from David Judson Montgomery to his mother
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A picture postcard from Bordeaux showing a large church identified as "Cathedrale Saint Andre -- CB" in a caption across the top of the image. The address side is filled with a letter to his mother and continues across much of the upper part of the printed image.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
